metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13625 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: PHPMailer before 6.1.6 contains an output escaping bug when the name of a file attachment contains a double quote character. This can result in the file type being misinterpreted by the receiver or any mail relay processing the message.

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
